headings: Amplifying the Value of AMI 1.0 and 2.0 Intelligence

Today’s utilities are harvesting less than 20% of the potential insights from their investments in AMI infrastructure. The AMI InsightAccelerator unlocks the remaining value, improving operations, customer engagement, and financial outcomes.
content: The AMI InsightAccelerator is BHC’s framework that leverages AMI 1.0/2.0 data to drive operational and customer-centric use cases. It focuses on rapid discovery and deployment of high-impact insights: outage detection and restoration, theft/tamper analytics, high bill complaint reduction, targeted customer programs, and meter performance monitoring. By blending utility domain expertise, data science accelerators, and a scalable delivery model, BHC helps utilities move from raw AMI data to measurable business value.

• Outage & Restoration Analytics: early detection of outages and verification of restoration events. • Theft & Non-Technical Loss: identify abnormal usage patterns and tamper events. • High Bill & Billing Accuracy: isolate meter/interval anomalies and target bill investigation. • Voltage & Power Quality: track sustained low/high voltage trends and service issues. • Customer Segmentation: micro-segmentation for demand response and energy efficiency programs. • Meter Health & Network Performance: detect failing meters, communication gaps, and firmware issues. • Safety & Risk: hazardous conditions from backfeed, neutral issues. • Fleet & Field Optimization: route and crew prioritization using AMI + GIS.

BHC Global delivers strategy, implementation, and managed services for the utility industry, with particular expertise across meter-to-cash, customer experience, outage & restoration, and advanced analytics. Our teams combine domain knowledge with modern cloud, data, and integration practices to deliver outcomes quickly.

Customer Experience & Billing: Implement + optimize Oracle Utilities (CCS/C2M/MDM), Salesforce, and bespoke portals. Improve first contact resolution, reduce service costs, and uplift CSAT via intelligent workflows and proactive notifications. AMI-to-CX: connect meter events and insights with customer channels to preempt issues, personalize outreach, and accelerate bill investigation.

Grid & Operations: Analytics for outage/restoration verification, non-technical loss, voltage/power quality, and meter health. AMI 1.0/2.0: organize interval data, firmware states, and communication logs into actionable dashboards and alerts.

Delivery Model: rapid discovery → use case backlog → pilot → scale. Accelerators: library of pre-built data models, feature stores, dashboards, and detection templates to speed time-to-value. Outcomes: reduced truck rolls, improved billing accuracy, higher program enrollment, and improved SAIDI/SAIFI performance.
